reasoning.description: Global default reasoning effort for Driftlock.

$schema.description: Optional JSON Schema reference for this config file.

auditors.description: Mapping from auditor name to its configuration.

validators.description: Mapping from validator name to its source path.

formatters.description: Formatter + schema assets used by Driftlock stages.

exclude.description: List of files or folders to exclude from plans.

qualityGate.description: Quality gate stage configuration (fail-fast order is build → lint → test).

runBaselineQualityGate.description: Whether to run a full build/lint/test cycle once before any auditors execute.

maxValidationRetries.description: Number of consecutive successful quality gate passes required per step (set to 2 for back-to-back green); on the first failure Driftlock enters regression immediately.

maxRegressionAttempts.description: Maximum number of regression-fix attempts allowed per step (0 means unbounded).

maxThreadLifetimeAttempts.description: Upper bound on Codex executor invocations (apply + fix_regression) per step (0 means unbounded).

turnTimeoutMs.description: Maximum time in milliseconds for a single Codex turn before aborting (0 disables the timeout).

pullRequest.description: Configuration for opening a GitHub Pull Request at the end of a run.

enabled.description: Whether to open a PR automatically when Driftlock exits and changes were committed.

gitHostSaas.description: Which Git hosting SaaS to use for pull request operations (currently only GitHub is supported).

reasoningEffort.description: Hint passed to Codex as model_reasoning_effort (some models may reject certain values; Driftlock will coerce unsupported combinations when needed).

enabled.description: Whether this auditor is active in the pipeline.

path.description: Path to the auditor prompt or definition file.

validators.description: Ordered list of validator names to apply to this auditor's plans.

model.description: Optional model override for this auditor.

reasoning.description: Optional reasoning effort override for this auditor.

formatterConfig.description: Formatter configuration (prompt + output schema) for a Driftlock stage.

schema.description: Path to the JSON Schema used to validate/shape the stage output.

model.description: Optional model override for this formatter-driven stage.

fixRegressionModel.description: Optional model override used only for the executor in fix_regression mode (when applicable).

reasoning.description: Optional reasoning effort override for this formatter-driven stage.

fixRegressionReasoning.description: Optional reasoning effort override used only for the executor in fix_regression mode (when applicable).
